headline: Down-South Style Green Beans
name: Down-South Style Green Beans
description: This recipe can also be cooked in a crock pot, and simmered all day. If fresh green beans are not available, use frozen. Just good ol' Southern style green beans with FLAVA!!
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons lard or other cooking fat
1 pound fresh green beans - rinsed, trimmed and snapped into bite size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the water, ham hock, and lard in a large pot over medium-high heat. Season with seasoning salt, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, and add green beans. Simmer covered for about 2 hours.
